channel.title: Big Brother racism
channel.description: I don't see how Brittan is to blame here, so far Jade Goodie hasn't been racist(as far as I know) yet on the news she's to blame?? Jermaine Jackson called Jade's mother white trash? Is that not racism?

item.title: Big Brother racism
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

the racism against shilpa was unbelieveable, jade was like vicky pollard!
no comment!
and im happy her eviction out was empty!
RACISM IS NOT MY TYPE!
Im not even an asian !

Read full topic

item.title: Big Brother racism
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:5, topic:48619”]Unfortunately the way that the world works currently is that the only people that can be racist are white (and male usually)

For example here in the USA there are PLENTY of scholarships for black males, black females, hispanics, asians, and all minorities. However when I need a scholarship, a white male scholarship is nowhere to be found, I got the shaft because of my race, that is racism in my book.[/quote]

This is very true. I thought that the whole Civil Rights thing was to make blacks and whites equal, there should be equal opprotunities for both, but instead it has gotten patchy. Some places white people are the minorities, sometimes the other races are. Also it’s retarded to think that the only people who could be racist are whites.

KC:

I think some guy has a stash in the desert of lots of big pictures of important people.

Like Chuck Norris. Try looking for his picture once.

Read full topic

item.title: Big Brother racism
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I didn’t say anything about not wanting to see it, I just dunno why everyones so shocked by it when it’s nothing new.

Read full topic

item.title: Big Brother racism
item.dc:creator: @regecks1 regecks`
item.description:
@regecks1 wrote:

I could use the same argument in you rejecting my child pornography, just because you don’t want to see it doesn’t mean it didn’t happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Big Brother racism
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:27, topic:48619”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=68117.msg802747#msg802747 date=1169417371]
Jesus, make a big deal about it why don’t you?

Black people DO rob cars. So do white people and indians.
Indians DO eat poppadoms. As do blacks and whites (indian takeaway a-hole)
Whites ARE big headed as fuck. So are blacks and indians (they are the ones who are so full of them selves they hate an offensive comment)

Stereotypes are almost always based on fact, deal with it and move on.
[/quote][/quote]

My point being, whites are xenophobic. Why is this suddenly a shocking revelation when it’s on TV?

Read full topic

item.title: Big Brother racism
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]don’t see how Brittan is to blame here, so far Jade Goodie hasn’t been racist(as far as I know) yet on the news she’s to blame??

It is the fault of the British public, for watching such a shit-stupid show.[/quote]

I don’t really watch it but the tv’s usually on during the day.

item.title: Big Brother racism
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“KC, post:21, topic:48619”]Big Brothers views have gone sky high but Channel 4 have messed up a lot because “Carphone Warehouse” have pulled out their sponsorship deal.

Also did anyone hear about the Indians burning pictures of the Channel 4 owners.

Can someone tell me where they got these pictures from.
I think some guy has a stash in the desert of lots of big pictures of important people.

Also I think that Big Brother should have made it clear in the rules that racism is not allowed. Also somebody should have intervined when all this racism was at its peak and taken on of the offenders out.[/quote]

Seriously? I’m thinking terrorist attack on big brother house.

Those crazy Indians… always take things too seriously.

Read full topic

item.title: Big Brother racism
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I like the show. I can be racist. I don't give a shit.

Well, my point was more if you watch reality TV, your probably a dumbass. It might be exciting to see politicians and such on, though, especially if they imitate a cat.

http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-1532509206579317476&q=big+brother+cat

I like the show. I can be racist. I don’t give a shit.

(Plus i only really watch the summer one because the celebrities are all unknowns in the winter one and i find it more interesting to see people from the public in the house (and the house is new and pretty))

item.title: Big Brother racism
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:10, topic:48619”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=68117.msg785626#msg785626 date=1169089330]
Unfortunately the way that the world works currently is that the only people that can be racist are white (and male usually)

For example here in the USA there are PLENTY of scholarships for black males, black females, hispanics, asians, and all minorities. However when I need a scholarship, a white male scholarship is nowhere to be found, I got the shaft because of my race, that is racism in my book.
[/quote]

yeah i agree with that, around here if i call someone a paki, i can get beaten up and put in a cell all night, but if they call me a chav, they get to walk freely

is jade the fat one that keeps getting angry? if so, i bet this was planned, cause she’s the one that people like to watch losing it, cussing, swearing and being offencive

also look at this way, big brother just got world coverage, and its rating are falling, IMO this is a publicity stunt[/quote]

Chav has nothing to do with race.

But yeh pakis will hit you for calling them that and black people will like… eat your brains if you call them a nigga. But us white people, just because of our ancestors slave business, are treated like crap and get called “white bois”.

Heres an example:

Me and my mates are jyst walking along then a group of black people go around a door and say “20p to pass” then when we just dont say anything and try to get passed they are like “OMG you white people just discriminate against us niggas” and we are like “what!?” then they just go “Stupid white kids” and walk off.

Back in the old days they would be branded and working in my cotton fields, but these days they are like all superior.

Also, a Eastern or black person would easily be able to sue someone for a racist offense. But has anyone heard of a white person suing for racism and winning? I think not.

Read full topic

item.title: Big Brother racism
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

newbiehacker:

burberry, white shoes, bling, curses, says “isit” and “brap” alot, likes to swear at people and start random fights, hate grungers/goths/emos/old people, is my definition of a chav.

Yeah same kinda thing but I’m called a chav at school so I miss out the bits that I don’t believe to be chavvy. Such as white shoes? Whats wrong with white shoes?

Read full topic

item.title: Big Brother racism
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:13, topic:48619”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=68117.msg788703#msg788703 date=1169165235]
Your pretty ignorant. Why the fuck would you call anyone from an Asian background a ‘paki’. Calling someone a ‘paki’ and calling someone a ‘chav’ is nowhere near the same thing.
[/quote]
im emphasise the ‘if’

also, just in case theres some misunderstanding, my definition of a chav is a derogatary term for white, working class person, whats yours?

okay, another example, calling someone a darkie and being called a cracker[/quote]

Chav doesn’t mean white, working class where I live. Where I live it means: Council house, no job, on the dole, if a girl pregnant at around 16 etc… Basically Vicky Pollard from the comedy show Little Britain.

Read full topic

For example here in the USA there are PLENTY of scholarships for black males, black females, hispanics, asians, and all minorities. However when I need a scholarship, a white male scholarship is nowhere to be found, I got the shaft because of my race, that is racism in my book.
[/quote]

yeah i agree with that, around here if i call someone a paki, i can get beaten up and put in a cell all night, but if they call me a chav, they get to walk freely

is jade the fat one that keeps getting angry? if so, i bet this was planned, cause she’s the one that people like to watch losing it, cussing, swearing and being offencive

also look at this way, big brother just got world coverage, and its rating are falling, IMO this is a publicity stunt[/quote]

Your pretty ignorant. Why the fuck would you call anyone from an Asian background a ‘paki’. Calling someone a ‘paki’ and calling someone a ‘chav’ is nowhere near the same thing.

item.title: Big Brother racism
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

The Un-Named:

I don’t see how Brittan is to blame here, so far Jade Goodie hasn’t been racist(as far as I know) yet on the news she’s to blame?? Jermaine Jackson called Jade’s mother white trash? Is that not racism?

I was reading about this on the front page of the newspaper (again…) and they said that Big Brother has shamed the UK. I was like wtf? Racism is everywhere these days, regardless of the country. I think this racism on Big Brother thing has been blown out of proportion by the media.

Read full topic
